object_id.description: @deprecated use ObjectIDs instead. The ID of the object to check roles for

object_ids.description: The IDs of the object to check roles for, can be used to check multiple ids in one request

items.description: The IDs of the object to check roles for, can be used to check multiple ids in one request

object_type.description: The type of object to check roles for, e.g. organization, program, procedure, etc

relations.description: The relations to check roles for, e.g. can_view, can_edit

items.description: The relations to check roles for, e.g. can_view, can_edit

subject_type.description: The type of subject to check roles for, e.g. service, user
